text: Angeke uMvelinqangi ashiye abakholwayo kuleso (simo) nina enikusona kuze kube uhlukanisa izoni kwabalungileyo futhi uMvelinqangi angeke anivezele (imfihlo) yokungabonwayo kepha uMvelinqangi ukhetha ezithunyweni zakhe lowo amthandayo, ngakho-ke kholwani kuMvelinqangi nasezithunyweni zakhe uma nikholwa futhi niqotho (nesaba uMvelinqangi) ngakho-ke okwenu umvuzo omkhulu
